title: Greek health bill aims to balance innovation access with stricter prescribing controls [Advocacy Lab]
summary_full: Athens is planning healthcare reforms, including a new HTA directorate and stricter controls on high-cost prescribing, this follows a new draft bill introducing an 'Innovation Fund'
summary_public: Athens is planning healthcare reforms, including a new HTA directorate and stricter controls on high-cost prescribing, this follows a new draft bill introducing an 'Innovation Fund'

GR.label: neutral
GR.evidence: Greek health bill aims to balance innovation access
